songs.title: Mama Pathuwe - Minura Halwathura
lyrics: ðŸŽµ Mama Pathuwe - Minura Halwathura ðŸŽµ
Mama Pathuwe oba lagama hamadaama nawathinna...
Mathakayata ida denna thiyenw thwa dura yanna...
Hitha athule aadaraya sagawagena baaa inna...
Aadarayen oba lagata weeee obatama atha denna................
Hiru yanawa awarata maaa kaluwarata huru wenna...
Sandata puluwani abaratama didulana eliyak wenna....................
Thibenaa thuru obe aaale mt oone raka ganna...
Obe lagatama weeee inna hamadaama ida denna...
Mata aasai atha allan obe muwaga sipa ganna...
Obe muhuna sinawen hamadaama pura wanna............
Duka danena wita numbata mta thuruluwa sanasenna..
Mata oone hamadaama numbe thurulatama wee inna.................
